snippet: Rajat K. Gupta's lawyers showed the jury an internal Goldman document compiled for Gary D. Cohn, then the bank's co-president, in preparation for a 2008 meeting he had with Raj Rajaratnam, the head of the Galleon Group hedge fund.
abstract: Rajat K. Gupta's lawyers showed the jury an internal Goldman document compiled for Gary D. Cohn, then the bank's co-president, in preparation for a 2008 meeting he had with Raj Rajaratnam, the head of the Galleon Group hedge fund.

headline.main: At Gupta Trial, a Glimpse at Goldman's Inner Workings
